verses.text: By \w night|strong="H3915"\w* on my \w bed|strong="H4904"\w* I \w sought|strong="H1245"\w* him whom my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w loveth|strong="H0157"\w*: I \w sought|strong="H1245"\w* him, but I \w found|strong="H4672"\w* him not.

I will \w rise|strong="H6965"\w* now, and go \w about|strong="H5437"\w* the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* in the \w streets|strong="H7784"\w*, and in the broad \w ways|strong="H7339"\w* I will \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* him whom my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w loveth|strong="H0157"\w*: I \w sought|strong="H1245"\w* him, but I \w found|strong="H4672"\w* him not.

The \w watchmen|strong="H8104"\w* that go \w about|strong="H5437"\w* the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* me: \add to whom I said\add*, \w Saw|strong="H7200"\w* ye him whom my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w loveth|strong="H0157"\w*?

\add It was\add* but a \w little|strong="H4592"\w* that I \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* from them, but I \w found|strong="H4672"\w* him whom my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w loveth|strong="H0157"\w*: I \w held|strong="H0270"\w* him, and would not let him \w go|strong="H7503"\w*, until I had \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* him into my \w mother’s|strong="H0517"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and into the \w chamber|strong="H2315"\w* of her that \w conceived|strong="H2029"\w* me.

I \w charge|strong="H7650"\w* you, O ye \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, by the \w roes|strong="H6643"\w*, \w and|strong="H0176"\w* by the \w hinds|strong="H0355"\w* of the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, that ye stir not \w up|strong="H5782"\w*, nor \w awake|strong="H5782"\w* \add my\add* \w love|strong="H0160"\w*, till he \w please|strong="H2654"\w*.

¶ Who \add is\add* this that \w cometh|strong="H5927"\w* out of the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* like \w pillars|strong="H8490"\w* of \w smoke|strong="H6227"\w*, \w perfumed|strong="H6999"\w* with \w myrrh|strong="H4753"\w* and \w frankincense|strong="H3828"\w*, with all \w powders|strong="H0081"\w* of the \w merchant|strong="H7402"\w*?

Behold his \w bed|strong="H4296"\w*, which \add is\add* \w Solomon’s|strong="H8010"\w*; \w threescore|strong="H8346"\w* \w valiant|strong="H1368"\w* men \add are\add* \w about|strong="H5439"\w* it, of the \w valiant|strong="H1368"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

They all \w hold|strong="H0270"\w* \w swords|strong="H2719"\w*, \add being\add* \w expert|strong="H3925"\w* in \w war|strong="H4421"\w*: every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \add hath\add* his \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* upon his \w thigh|strong="H3409"\w* because of \w fear|strong="H6343"\w* in the \w night|strong="H3915"\w*.

\w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* himself a \w chariot|strong="H0668"\w* of the \w wood|strong="H6086"\w* of \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w*.\f + \fr 3.9 \ft a chariot: or, a bed\f*

He \w made|strong="H6213"\w* the \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w* thereof \add of\add* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, the \w bottom|strong="H7507"\w* thereof \add of\add* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, the \w covering|strong="H4817"\w* of it \add of\add* \w purple|strong="H0713"\w*, the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* thereof being \w paved|strong="H7528"\w* \add with\add* \w love|strong="H0160"\w*, for the \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

Go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*, O ye \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, and \w behold|strong="H7200"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* with the \w crown|strong="H5850"\w* wherewith his \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* \w crowned|strong="H5849"\w* him in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of his \w espousals|strong="H2861"\w*, and in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the \w gladness|strong="H8057"\w* of his \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*.
